üë®‚Äçüíº Work History

TVH Parts & Co - Business Analyst

2020 - Kansas City

My first internship as a business analyst within the IT department of TVH Parts. During my internship i worked on a business modeling project with the objective to develop automated tests from the most critical business process identified. To accomplish this task i modeled the critical business processes in BPMN using Enterprise Architect. This was done after recording the business requirements with the most important stakeholders beforehand.

Capgemini - Application Developer

2020 - Paris

I have worked on different projects which were mainly focused on mobile and web technologies such as React, Angular, React-Native, Node, service-workers, Docker, AWS, Typescript ... . I helped in delivering these projects on time according to the clients requirements. Some examples of integrated features include applications such as applications with QR readers, animations in applications, setup of microservices. My clients included Airliquide, RATP and Airbus.
